name: Death Report
query:
SELECT 
    ds.patient AS "Patient ID:Data:100", 
    ds.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:200", 
    ds.sex AS "Gender:Data:100", 
    ds.date_of_birth AS "DOB:Data:100", 
    ds.ref_practitioner AS "Consultant:Data:250", 
    ip.admitted_datetime AS "Admitted Date:Data:200",
    ds.date AS "Discharge Date:Data:100", 
    ds.diagnosis_at_discharge AS "Diagnosis at Discharge:Data:250", 
    ds.operations_and_procedures AS "Operations and Procedures:Data:250",
    ds.reason__admission_and_presenting_complaints AS "Admitted Reason:Data:250"
    
FROM `tabDischarge Summary` ds
LEFT JOIN `tabInpatient Record` ip ON ip.name = ds.inpatient_record
WHERE ds.date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s AND ds.docstatus = 1 AND ds.discharged_type = "Death";
